page.title: 13Sport in Collingham
page.content: The{fishing club }is fortunate that the River Trent is close by.Matches are arranged and there are several trophies to be won throughout the season. The{lawn tennis club }has a membership of 121.By village standards this means that it is a very large and flourishing club with 3 hard and 4 grass courts.There are 4 tournaments during the year and professional coaching on Mondays. The{bowls club }has almost 50 members, playing matches in both the Newark and the Lincoln leagues. {Badminton }is played on 3 nights of the week.Matches are arranged with other local clubs. Recently,village people got together to build a B.M.X.track because so many children now have these stunt bikes.A{ {B.M.X.}bike can cost more than Â£100.
